SEARCH
Package Server.Web.Lobby

Class Room

java.lang.Object
Server.Web.Lobby.Room
public class Room extends Object
The type Room. This class represents a room in the lobby, where players can join and play a game.

    • Room

      public Room(String name, int expectedPlayers, Lobby lobby)
      Class constructor
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the room
      expectedPlayers - the number of player to wait in order to start the game
      lobby - the lobby to which the room belongs

      Allows a player in the room
      Parameters:
      name - the player's nickname
      handler - the player's handler
      Throws:
      CantJoinRoomExcept - if the room is full

    • removePlayerBeforeStart

      public void removePlayerBeforeStart(String player)
      If a player quits the game while still in the "waiting for other players phase", we simply remove him from all the room's lists, so that another player can instantly join the game
      Parameters:
      player - the player's name

    • getName

      Gets name.

      Parameters:
      player - the player's nickname
      Returns:
